name: INRestaurantReservationUserBooking
desc: A reservation created by a user.

items.name: init(restaurant: INRestaurant, booking: Date, partySize: Int, bookingIdentifier: String, guest: INRestaurantGuest, status: INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus, dateStatusModified: Date)
items.desc: Initializes the reservation object with the specified information and status.

items.name: var guest: INRestaurantGuest
items.desc: The guest associated with the reservation.

items.name: var status: INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus
items.desc: The current status of the reservation.

items.name: var dateStatusModified: Date
items.desc: The date on which the status of the reservation changed.

items.name: var guestProvidedSpecialRequestText: String?
items.desc: Any special requests made by the user with the reservation.

items.name: var selectedOffer: INRestaurantOffer?
items.desc: The offer selected by the user.

items.name: var advisementText: String?
items.desc: A user-readable string containing policies and information related to the reservation.

items.name: enum INRestaurantReservationUserBookingStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating the status of a user reservation.
